CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% . 21,22 Geng and co-workers synthesized two PT - based donor materials by incorporating carboxylate side chains and vinylene linkers between thiophene units. The HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels of the resulting polymers , PBT and PTT , were substantially stabilized when compared to those of the parent P3HT. Such energy level lowering was attributed to the integration of carboxylate and vinylene groups giving rise to a push - pull structural motif , resulting in an enhanced PCE of the PV devices based on them. 21 Over the years , the use of the structural effect to enhance PSC performance has been extensively investigated , particularly the donor - acceptor ( D-A ) strategy , which has been proved to be an effective approach to develop donor polymers with wide absorption , low - lying energy levels , and enhanced electron properties. 23-32 Besides , conjugation expansion on the polymer backbone is an alternative tool to improve the electronic properties of polymers. By replacing a branched 2ethylhexyl side chain with a linear n-octyl group , Zhang and his co-workers synthesized a PTB7-Th derivative namely , PBTT. PV cells based on PBTT : IEICO showed a superior device performance than that of the PTB7-Th - based device with a PCE of 9.5% , a V oc of 0.86 V , a J sc of 17.9 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 61.3% . Such dramatic enhancement in efficiency was attributed to a higher charge mobility and improved morphology of the PBTT : IEICO blend film induced by the less steric hindered linear alkyl side chain. 1 Yang and coworkers used selenophene to replace thiophene π-bridge in the indacenodithiophene (IDT)-benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD)-based copolymer ( PThBDDIDT ) to develop a donor-π-acceptor type copolymer , PSeBDDIDT. The PCE of solar cells based on polymer : PC71BM as an active layer was dramatically increased from 7.04 to 8.65% , respectively. Such improvement could result from stronger intermolecular interactions , expanded absorption range , and better molecular planarity of selenophene contained PSeBDDIDT. 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T. The PSC based on a terpolymer with the optimized T / 2T ratio of 7 : 3 showed a high J sc of 18.3 mA cm^-2 and a FF of 71.2% , thus resulting in an enhanced PCE up to 10.8% . 34 Fluorination on polymer backbones has also been widely adopted to tune and improve the functional properties of donor polymers such as stabilization of their energy levels and hence positively impacting on PSC performance.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |
| PBT |
| PTT |
| PTB7-Th |
| PBTT |
| PThBDDIDT |
| PSeBDDIDT |
| T |
| 2T |
| terpolymer (T/2T ratio of 7:3) |
| PC71BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |
| PBT |
| PTT |
| PTB7-Th |
| PBTT |
| PThBDDIDT |
| PSeBDDIDT |

I removed the following entities from the list as they do not clearly refer to material names:

* "donor polymers"
* "copolymer"
* "terpolymers"
* "thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [3,4-g]-thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione" (this is a specific molecule, not a material name)

The remaining entities in the list are all clearly referred to as material names in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% . 21,22 Geng and co-workers synthesized two PT - based donor materials by incorporating carboxylate side chains and vinylene linkers between thiophene units. The HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels of the resulting polymers , PBT and PTT , were substantially stabilized when compared to those of the parent P3HT. Such energy level lowering was attributed to the integration of carboxylate and vinylene groups giving rise to a push - pull structural motif , resulting in an enhanced PCE of the PV devices based on them. 21 Over the years , the use of the structural effect to enhance PSC performance has been extensively investigated , particularly the donor - acceptor ( D-A ) strategy , which has been proved to be an effective approach to develop donor polymers with wide absorption , low - lying energy levels , and enhanced electron properties. 23-32 Besides , conjugation expansion on the polymer backbone is an alternative tool to improve the electronic properties of polymers. By replacing a branched 2ethylhexyl side chain with a linear n-octyl group , Zhang and his co-workers synthesized a PTB7-Th derivative namely , PBTT. The PCE of solar cells based on polymer : PC71BM as an active layer was dramatically increased from 7.04 to 8.65% , respectively. Such improvement could result from stronger intermolecular interactions , expanded absorption range , and better molecular planarity of selenophene contained PSeBDDIDT. 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T. The PSC based on a terpolymer with the optimized T / 2T ratio of 7 : 3 showed a high J sc of 18.3 mA cm^-2 and a FF of 71.2% , thus resulting in an enhanced PCE up to 10.8% . 34 Fluorination on polymer backbones has also been widely adopted to tune and improve the functional properties of donor polymers such as stabilization of their energy levels and hence positively impacting on PSC performance.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |
| LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| Voc (Open-Circuit Voltage) |
| Jsc (Short-Circuit Current Density) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| HOMO Energy Levels |
| LUMO Energy Levels |
| P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) |
| PCBM ([6,6]-Phenyl-C61-Butyric Acid Methyl Ester) |
| PBT (Poly(4-butylthiophene)) |
| PTT (Poly(4-tert-butylthiophene)) |
| PBTT (Poly(4-butylthiophene-2-yl)-alt-poly(4-tert-butylthiophene-2-yl)) |
| PThBDDIDT (Poly(thieno[2',3':5',6']pyrido[3,4-g]thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione-co-benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c']dithiophene-4,8-dione)) |
| PSeBDDIDT (Poly(selenophene-co-benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c']dithiophene-4,8-dione)) |
| T (Thiophene) |
| 2T (Dithiophene) |

Note: The property names are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 3-4% | PCE range of PT-based PSCs |
| 21 | Reference number for Geng's work |
| 23-32 | Reference range for D-A strategy |
| 2ethylhexyl | Side chain replaced by linear n-octyl group in PBTT synthesis |
| n-octyl | Linear side chain used in PBTT synthesis |
| 9.5% | PCE of PV cells based on PBTT:IEICO |
| 0.86 V | Voc of PV cells based on PBTT:IEICO |
| 17.9 mA cm^-2 | Jsc of PV cells based on PBTT:IEICO |
| 61.3% | FF of PV cells based on PBTT:IEICO |
| 1 | Yang's work reference number |
| 7.04% | Initial PCE of solar cells based on PThBDDIDT |
| 8.65% | Improved PCE of solar cells based on PSeBDDIDT |
| 33 | Reference number for Yang's work on random terpolymers |
| 7:3 | Optimized T/2T ratio in terpolymer synthesis |
| 18.3 mA cm^-2 | Jsc of PSC based on optimized terpolymer |
| 71.2% | FF of PSC based on optimized terpolymer |
| 10.8% | Enhanced PCE of PSC based on optimized terpolymer |

Please note that the values in the "Description" column are not necessarily material properties, but rather descriptions of the values in the "Property Value" column.
